entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
